ui.anonymityNotice: Screen names are allowed, but anonymity is discouraged. Please write as if your name were attached. Administrators can review account details when needed for moderation and safety.
ui.commentGuidance: Write about your own experience. Keep it professional and specific. Emotional rants, insults, or hearsay may be removed.
ui.businessReplyGuidance: Reply professionally and focus on facts, fixes, and next steps. Unprofessional replies, personal attacks, threats, or discriminatory language will be removed.
ui.minWordsNotice: Comments must be at least 10 words.
ui.ratingScaleNotice: Ratings use a 0 to 5 scale. Half steps are allowed.

popup.title: Before you continue
popup.intro: This directory is community powered. To keep it useful and safe, we require everyone who posts to follow these rules:
popup.rule1Body: Post only what happened to you personally.
popup.rule2Body: No insults, harassment, threats, hate speech, or discriminatory content.
popup.rule3Body: Do not share emails, phone numbers, home addresses, or identifying details about individuals.
popup.rule4Body: We may remove content that breaks these rules, and we may suspend accounts for repeated violations.
popup.checkbox1: I will post only firsthand experiences.
popup.checkbox2: I will keep my comments professional and avoid harassment or hate.
popup.checkbox3: I understand my content may be moderated or removed if it violates policy.

policies.topSummary: This directory is here to share practical, firsthand experiences in a respectful way. Ratings and comments should be professional, specific, and based on what happened to you personally. We remove content that is hateful, harassing, private, or not firsthand.
